TermOfService.title: Term of Service
TermOfService.description: Please read the terms of service carefully before using the service
TermOfService.introduceDescription: Welcome to our Terms of Service page. By using our service, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions.
TermOfService.useTheServiceDescription: You agree to use our service only for lawful purposes and not to violate any laws. You may not use our service to distribute illegal, harmful, or infringing content.
TermOfService.intellectualPropertyDescription: All content and materials on our website, including text, images, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by us or our licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.
TermOfService.changeTheTermsDescription: We reserve the right to change these terms of service at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of our service after the changes are posted will be considered your acceptance of those changes.
TermOfService.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions about these terms of service, please contact us via the email or phone number provided on our website.

About.title: About us
About.address: Address: 585 Nguyen Thi Thap, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City
About.ourStoryDescription: Big Boy was founded in 2025 with a simple mission: serving delicious, high quality food to connect people together. Our passion for special raw materials and creative formulas have made us a favorite local organization, famous for its commitment to creating nourishing meals and souls.
About.ourValueDescription: At the center of Big Boy is a profound dedication to sustainability, community and excellence in cuisine. We take raw materials from local farmers and manufacturers, ensuring freshness and supporting the local economy. Our team is passionate about creating dishes that not only satisfy the taste buds but also nourish the body, with the focus on healthy food, without processing.
About.ourCommitmentDescription: We believe that delicious food has the power to connect people together and create long -term memories. That is why we are committed to providing a great culinary experience, from the time you walk through the door to the last piece of the meal. Our talented chefs work constantly to create the best dishes that show seasonal ingredients, taken from the locality, ensuring that each dish is a celebration of flavor and quality. quantity.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.description: Please read the privacy policy carefully before using the service
PrivacyPolicy.dataCollectedDescription: We collect personal information that you provide when creating an account, ordering, or contacting us. This information may include name. In addition, we also collect some information automatically when you access our website, such as IP address and browser type.

purposeOfUseDescription.title: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
purposeOfUseDescription.item1: To process your order: We use your contact and payment information to confirm and process orders, as well as to send invoices and delivery information.
purposeOfUseDescription.item2: To provide customer support: We use your contact information to respond to your requests and provide customer support.
purposeOfUseDescription.item3: To send promotional emails: We use your email address to send you promotional emails about our products and services.
purposeOfUseDescription.item4: To improve our service: We use aggregated and anonymized data to analyze trends and improve our service.

HomePage.title: Home page
HomePage.description: Craving a classic American diner experience? Look no further than Big Boy! Savor our iconic Big Boy burger, juicy and flavorful, paired with creamy milkshakes and crispy fries. Perfect for families and friends!
